name: shale brick production | shale brick | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11609/documentation

This dataset represents the production of brick from shale in Quebec in 2012.;Specific data were collected from the only producer of brick in Quebec on the basis of shale extracted annually. The amount of brick produce annually was calculated by data provider in order to report the specific data by kg of brick produce.  The annual production volume of the region is of 66'957 tons.;;This company also provided data for the datasets ''shale quarry operation, QC, 2012'' and ''brick production facility construction, QC, 2029''.

This activity starts from the reception of shale.

The activity ends with the storage of brick.

The dataset includes first ginding process, wet process (includes second ginding, mixing and plastifying), storage, forming (extruding molding method) and cutting, drying, firing, loading and storage.

This dataset doesn't include :
1) Packaging of the brick (should be included in the market) : wood inserted into the pallets of bricks (7.094E-04 kg/kg), high density polyethylene (tethers for pallets) (4.77E-04 kg/kg)
2) Some of the waste (recycling) : tatters and absorbant contaminated with oil and grease (1.531E-05 kg/kg), hydraulic hoses (7.47E-07 kg/kg), batteries (3.062E-06 kg/kg), neons (5.041E-05 linear feet/kg), metals (3.425E-04 kg/kg), plastic bags containing barium (1.355E-04 kg/kg), paper bags/plastics (1.47E-04 l/kg).
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2392:Manufacture of clay building materials

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The dataset represents the activity in 2012
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Inputs and outputs relate to Quebec production.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Specific data were collected from the only producer of brick in Quebec. Extrapolations were made from brick production, GLO dataset (ecoinvent v3) for the molds. Uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The data relates to only productor of brick in Quebec.
